description: Orario has a new natural hot spring thanks to the Dian Cecht Familia, but Naaza of the Miach Familia suspects an elaborate con and needs help to prove it. That means Bell is caught in the middle of an ongoing rivalry between two Familias. Again.

titles.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Find a Hot Spring in Orario? Bath God Forever
Orario ni Onsen o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darouka: Ofuro no Kamisama Forever
オラリオに温泉を求めるのは間違っているだろうか ~おふろの神様フォーエバー~
